titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on amitraz.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on N'-(2,4-dimethylphenyl)-N-(((2, 4 dimethylphenyl)imino) methyl)-N methylmethanimidamide (also known as amitraz).
